definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.name
definition.description: Specify a descriptive name for the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.description
definition.description: Specify a brief description of the managed system

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.location
definition.description: Specify the location of the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.vendor
definition.description: Specify the vendor of the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.version
definition.description: Specify the version of the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.businessOwner
definition.description: Specify the business owner of the managed system. Select a user object (not a role, group, or container).

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.applicationOwner
definition.description: Specify the application owner of the managed system. Select a user object (not a role, group, or container).

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.classification
definition.description: Specify the classification of the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.environment
definition.description: Specify the type of environment the managed system provides.

header.display-name: Connection And Miscellaneous Information (auto-generated, do not change!)

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.auth.ip
definition.description: IP address used to authenticate to the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.auth.port
definition.description: Port used to authenticate to the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.auth.id
definition.description: User ID used to authenticate to managed system.
